farmcity.entity

Class Plot

  • java.lang.Object
    • farmcity.entity.Plot

  • public class Plot
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains attributes, setter and getter methods for the Plot entity

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Plot(int plotNumber)
      This constructor initializes the Plot object by passing in the Plot number as an int, setting the Plot status to empty (e), percentage of planted Crop to 0 and time Planted as well as Crop planted on the Plot to null
      Plot(int plotNumber, char status, java.util.Calendar timePlanted, int percentage, Crop crop)
      This constructor initializes the Plot object by passing in the plot number (int), status of the plot (char), time Planted (Calendar), growth percentage (int) and the Crop planted on the Plot to the corresponding attributes

    • Constructor Detail

      • Plot

        public Plot(int plotNumber)
        This constructor initializes the Plot object by passing in the Plot number as an int, setting the Plot status to empty (e), percentage of planted Crop to 0 and time Planted as well as Crop planted on the Plot to null
        Parameters:
        plotNumber - Number of the Plot, based on how many Plots player currently have

      • Plot

        public Plot(int plotNumber,
            char status,
            java.util.Calendar timePlanted,
            int percentage,
            Crop crop)
        This constructor initializes the Plot object by passing in the plot number (int), status of the plot (char), time Planted (Calendar), growth percentage (int) and the Crop planted on the Plot to the corresponding attributes
        Parameters:
        plotNumber - Number of the Plot, based on how many Plots player currently have, fixed
        status - Status of the Plot, can be empty (e), planted (p), harvestable (h) or wilted (w)
        timePlanted - The attribute which represents the moment the Crop is planted on the Plot
        percentage - The growth percentage of the Crop, ranges from 0 to 100
        crop - The type of Crop planted on the Plot
